website_summaries.verdict: Offers excellent support for the whole body whether you sleep on your back or your side.
pros: While it was designed for pregnancy, people also find it helpful for pain related to chronic fatigue syndrome, fibromyalgia, and more
cons: Some users found it wasn't soft and fluffy enough for their taste

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product from two years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last year under my sisters account a long time ago and at the time I purchased it it was on sale. It was amazing puffy and big. And this time after buying it 2 days ago.... the product is not good. Its smaller and the pillow inside isnt even puffy like it used to be. I added two pictures on here The one on the left [light gray] is the one I bought a year ago The one on the right [dark gray] is the one I bought recently
customer_reviews.author: PlamooseGoose

customer_reviews.title: Takes up half the bed so hubby is still fine, maybe just a little jealous lol
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed! Soon as it came out of the package that kept it flat, it poofed right up. And the grey cover is so soft. You can fluff it up for more support and it’s very versatile. Takes up half the bed so hubby is still fine, maybe just a little jealous lol. He just ends up cuddling the side I’m not using! Recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Long

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I know its a little pricey, but its definitely a great investment when you're pregnant and have difficulty staying one place. I was told not tolay flat on back, on my stomach or toss and turn too much, Its best to sleep on your side after the first trimester. I'm 38 weeks pregnant and I sleep so well, its so comfortable, I absolutely love it When I'm not in it cats seem to like it
customer_reviews.author: Shayda

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me. Don’t wanna sit/sleep without it.
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble falling asleep in the 3rd and 4th month of my pregnancy. Tired of sleep deprivation, hurting knee and sore back, I ordered this pillow and it really worked well for me. Husband hates it but he was happy to see me sleep comfortably. I weighed this pillow against other options like Snoogle n Boppy wedge. But I wanted support no matter which side I slept on. I couldn’t imagine waking up to adjust the boppy wedge every time I had to turn to the other side. It seemed pointless. Same for the snoogle or any other C- shaped body pillow. With a U-shaped pillow I don’t even notice when I shift sides at night.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful pillow, lacks support and the filling is spotty. It does not fluff or fill the pillow out. When you lay your head on it you fall straight on the floor. The whole point for this pillow is to support and it DOES NOT do that on the head, arm or leg regions of the pillow. I like to sleep with pillows between my legs or in my arms and this is junk. This pillow would not support a pregnant woman properly. I will return this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pregnant people
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50 so I am, obviously, not pregnant. I bought this since I have a hard time getting comfortable and always use 5 or 6 pillows to try to sleep. This product is so comfortable, that I can finally get some good sleep. I bought one for my daughter too and she loves it too. It is not just for pregnant people. I also use it to watch TV in bed by crisscrossing the lower parts Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marni Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. This pillow has been very comfortable, but it doesn’t last. Despite trying to keep it fluffed, it gets flat very quickly. It’s also close to impossible to wash the cover. The material is very flimsy and rips at the seems. I wish the quality was better so it would last. UPDATE: After reviewing this product, the company reached out to me. They offered a full refund and additional stuffing when it becomes available. They were helpful and gracious. I increased my star rating based on my satisfaction with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bores

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So i feel like the photos and description are misleading. Mine doesn’t have much support. It flops all over the place. Not very firm at all. Not even the same shape as what i thought i was ordering. When I opened it there was a disclaimer/warning that it may take a couple days for it to reach it full size and fluffyness so to speak. However ive had mine for more than a week and its the same size and fluff as the day I opened it. I dont feel any more comfortable with it than i did without it. If it wasn’t for the hassell it takes for returns i would definitely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny- “hot box” pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is...the weirdest pillow ever. First off, the case is faux suede and hot feeling in the middle of the night(being pregnant you need a case made of corton or something breathable). Also...it is weird, the middle of the pilly barely leaves any room for shoulders and I’m not big, 170lbs at 35 weeks, I was 135lb pre-pregnancy. I am 5’7” and this pillow makes me feel like I am constricted, it’s vwry hard to get comfortable. Do yourself a favor and get once of thise longer C shaped ones that you can use multiple ways and are not confined to a tint box. However, the legs do hit the right soots, but my neck and shoulders are extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: WildeMamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Neck and back pain is much better!!
customer_reviews.text: Back and neck pain has been 75% better with this. I am 37, 5'11', with arthritis and some deteriorating discs, brand new high end mattress wasn't completely cutting it, this has helped so much!
customer_reviews.author: Brett W Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Wife tried it for 1/2 a night and couldn't use ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife tried it for 1/2 a night and couldn't use it. She is shorter and the curves did not fit. She said the padding did not give enough support.
customer_reviews.author: d1rtydancer

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars 🚫
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! This is the size of a normal body pillow! Don't waste hard earned money people! The pictures are very deceiving it is not big or thick or long or huge. It is the same size a a body pillow you can buy from Walmart for $10!! I am very very very upset with this purchase. ZERO STARS.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover26

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for no more than 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is not as big as I thought, which is good, and the material is cozy and snuggly. However, the head rest is way too high, to the point where I wake up with a neck ache, and actually tired from tossing and turning, trying to get comfy all night. I think this pillow is nice and comfy for a couple of hours maybe of watching tv or chilling on the bed, but definitely NOT an all-night sleeping pillow. If the head rest was more fluffy, or lower in height, this pillow would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: m.ju

customer_reviews.title: What a SCAM!!
customer_reviews.text: Never even used it. Opened the box. It never really puffed up, no filling, limp and smelled like mildew. Don’t waste your time...shoved it back in box and returning. Will go to Mother Hood Maternity for a pillow. Can’t believe Amazon backed this.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan’s hot dogs

customer_reviews.title: Another review
customer_reviews.text: My spouse purchased this pillow for me and after reading the reviews I can understand why. But the pillow I experienced was nothing like the reviews I’ve seen. It wasn’t firm, supportive, or comfy. My cheap body pillow from Walmart offers more support. I’m going to be returning it, I’m super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Brunshae R.

customer_reviews.title: Get this pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pregnancy and second pregnancy pillow. I never want to let go! It’s soooo comfy and i ordered the 65 inch so it’s extra long and gives me room to wrap it around me perfectly. I layed in it to test it out and now I don’t want to get up. I highly recommend this pillow to every pregnant woman out there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Comunale

customer_reviews.title: Very long pillow with insufficient filling
customer_reviews.text: When you get this item it will be air compressed, you open the package and it fluffs up....but not as much as you'd expect. It's not a rigid pillow at all in any areas so it kind of flops all over and only offers frontal support. You can sort of wedge it into your back and scoot backward into it to get more support, but it doesn't last. The moment you move in your sleep the pillow splays out behind you and your support is gone. The pillows are also VERY narrow, so even in terms of front support it's minimal. It -barely- supports your leg when you try to drape a leg over it. Better off getting another brand.
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured! Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this pillow! This pregnancy has been horrible for my sleep and getting comfortable. After reading reviews I was confident in my choice. I was so wrong! The pillow that actually came was NOTHING as pictured! Not nearly as fluffy. It really hasn’t made a difference with my sleep. I thought spending the extra money on this would be worth it! I am so disappointed. I tried my sisters which is a different company and it as amazing! I will be returning this and buying the different brand! I really wanted this to work!
customer_reviews.author: luka22

customer_reviews.title: Flat as can be!  No support!  Should not be called a pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a real disappointment. It came vacuum sealed and when I opened it I really expected it to be much fuller. I thought maybe it just needed a day or so to fluff back up to size after having been vacuum sealed for a while. I was wrong. This thing is flat as can be. It has gaps all throughout the long arm parts where stuffing clumps and separates. Awful. I don't know how I can even return it because it's HUGE without the vacuum sealing. I fear I'm stuck with this blanket of a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: william tell-you-like-it-is

customer_reviews.title: MOLDY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came fairly quickly, but it came dirty! It looks like rust all over the pillow with either mold or really black dirt! Gross!!! At least it has a zipper so it’s easy to wash. *update: I took off pillow case only to find that the pillow itself is yellow too. After washing the case, the yellowness didn’t come out and neither did the black spots. So great, I was given a moldy pillow. This pillow is for PREGNANT WOMEN!
customer_reviews.author: Christy S

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 25 weeks pregnant wife. Turns out she lost her sleep twice when she used it. Bad! It's not as soft as reported in some reviews I read before buying. Maybe worked for others , but not for us. Giving 2 stars only for packaging and form factors etc. otherwise not good to mention about the body pillow. I'm returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: get the pillow!
customer_reviews.text: what at great pillow! i bought this bc my other half is gone for work and i was having trouble sleeping. not anymore! this pillow is amazing to sleep with. i recommend this pillow whether you’re prego or just missing having someone to sleep with. it’s totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lallement

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When my pillow first arrived and I unpacked it, I thought it wouldn’t provide enough support. But after sleeping with it, I found it to be very comfortable. Woke up without any aches or pains. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. Stuffing pillows under me everywhere was not working. I sleep much better with this pillow. I like the feeling of being surrounded by support. Much cheaper than most maternity pillows too!
customer_reviews.author: dawn r. curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: Even the dogs love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow because from the beginning of my pregnancy I had pretty bad hip pain. I also wanted to lay on my stomach but was too afraid to. This pillow definitely worked some magic! I love that you can remove the cover to wash it. It doesn't make you over heat either. My only complaint was that the stuffing (over time) moved to the ends of the pillow making them heavier. This caused the side closest to the edge of the bed to fall off often . However, you have access to the stuffing part and can refluff if necessary! I would recommend this pillow over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Byers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's my daughters favorite pillow, the dogs favorite bed n its just so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after returning another U-shaped pillow. I love the softness of the velour cover. I don’t sleep hot normally, but u am a little hot now that I am pregnant. This cover doesn’t make me feel overheated regardless. It really helped my side pain and aligned my hips. The softness of the pillow and support are very decent. I like slightly firm and pliable pillows i can fluff to meet my needs. To get some extra support I purchased additional shredded memory foam filling and added it in, but that’s just to my personal preference. This was a great purchase, I would do it again or buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: One wife loved it the other couldn't get comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of seeing two women use this while pregnant. My first wife used this regularly to push against her back or keep her knees apart. My second wife couldn't get comfortable with it and now it's just a toy for the kids. Id say it did its job well enough. It's just not right for everyone. Then again what two pregnancies are ever the same. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Blithe

customer_reviews.title: Not long term quality
customer_reviews.text: Okay at first I loved this pillow. The 65” length was perfect and the pillow filling provided the perfect amount of support. Also loved the velvety pillowcase. I did feel like the price was a little steep for the pillow but was overall happy with my purchase. However, I’ve had this pillow for about a month and the seams on the pillowcase are coming apart in 3 different places. I haven’t taken the case off to inspect for additional tearing yet, so there could be more that I’m unaware of. Of course I noticed this just after the return window had closed. The pillow is obviously still functional but it is disappointing. I don’t see it holding up long term.
customer_reviews.author: @elastikheart

customer_reviews.title: Expected luxury...
customer_reviews.text: At first when my product came in the mail i was excited. Although it is not as fluffy as the picture as i expected. It kept its form for a at least a month. I purchased the largest model. It has lost its form. Its not fluffy feeling at all. Actually feels like crumbled styrofoam. It has lost its shape and i paid over 70$ for it. I feel like its worth closer to $25-30 max Over time the pillow is breaking and taking up space. I hope customer service or someone will offer a promotion i feel like i been ripped for an 80$ pillow
customer_reviews.author: Bags

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcase fail
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the pillow, but our pillowcase didn’t last very long. Which is really disappointing since we love the texture. Now we’re having a hard time finding another pillowcase that fits (we purchased the 65 in). And now it looks like we’ll need to buy a whole new pillow altogether. If it was t for the faulty pillowcase this is a 5 star pillow with its comfort and texture for the price We purchased two 65in pillowcases that didn’t fit. If the company sold their own pillowcases there wouldn’t be any issues but seeing as I need to completely replace the whole pillow it’s a huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Product quality has declined significantly..
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer had the same experience regarding quality. It was a quality product when I purchased it in Jan 2018. When I received a new pillow last week, I was extremely disappointed. The quality, filling, and size instantly appeared to be significantly less than the pillow I purchased in 2018. I had clicked on “buy it again” so I would make sure I received the same pillow. I just completed the return request and will be sending it back. I’m so disappointed in how cheaply it was made.
customer_reviews.author: MorganTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - See Pic!
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising. It is not the size that it looks in the picture, it’s flat, hardly stuffed, and terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Leary

customer_reviews.title: PAMPERED PILLOW PERFECTION ! Your worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this pillow and I’m not even preggo! Only wish I tried one sooner in life and could have reduced many sleepless nights and back and neck pain. Perfect for movie nights! I was never able to get comfy on the couch. Perfect for bedtime reading nights and Netflix marathons. Perfect for the passenger drivers seat naps during long trips. And most of all, perfect for a good nights supportive sleep! My husband now calls me Queen Rose when I’m wrapped in my royal purple satin!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robin Erickson

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND worth the money. A baby mama lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best purchase I’ve ever made on amazon. I’m 22 weeks pregnant on bedrest and could NOT find relief. I caved and after doing a bit of research, order this pillow. My husband can attest: it. is. worth. it. Seriously a life saver for those of use that have trouble sleeping and/or staying on your side throughout the night. I’m so grateful for this dang pillow! It’s actually going with me to the hospital and I have zero shame. The velvet is super soft, cushioning is firm enough to support but crazy comfortable, and the quality is fantastic. Totally a go-to gift for my mama friends moving forward. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme McCrimmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pillow Just what I ordered replaced one that I had for over seven years they lasted very long time they do relieve pain they help you sleep 100% better and it does keep your husband on his side of the bed were you can have a peaceful night sleep
customer_reviews.author: dianne s turner

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dude, but I have back pain when I sleep. I’ve tried knee pillows, boards under my mattress, etc. I wish I had just bought this from the get go. I had another pillow, but it was a “L” shape. It worked, but I could really only sleep on one side. I can just flip over whenever with this. I never wake up with back pain & sleep like a champ. I’ll never go without one of these again. Note: I’m a shorter guy (5’7”). This might not be big enough for taller guys. Idk.

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Foul Odor
customer_reviews.text: Pillow Arrived in vacuum sealed plastic. Open opening pillow had an extreme foul odor. At first I thought we could just wash cover but pillow smelled and stuffing inside was where the smell was coming from. Almost smells as if it was damp and moldy. Tried to air it out in the garage for a few days but stunk up our entire garage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and provides back support when sleeping on your side
customer_reviews.text: Love this full body pregnancy pillow. I'm currently on my 29th week of pregnancy and have slept with this pillow every night since purchasing it. I normally sleep on my left side with the lower part of the pillow between my legs and the other side of the pillow supporting my back. And when I do feel like switching sides for a little while I just turn over and have the same comfort and support. I'm so glad I tried this pillow out!! Love this pillow and can't sleep without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ace603

customer_reviews.title: Caused pain for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the third trimester. I own a down body pillow that was $$$ and doesn’t wrap around so it isn’t as user friendly as the QR. however, the QR has a seam on the inside of the pillow facing you. This is a design flaw! I woke up with a burning ear one night and that was it-back it went. Too bad bc without the seam it would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: k8wma

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleep of My Life!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has given me the best sleep of my life!! I am not pregnant. I have struggled with back and neck pain and uncomfortable sleep for a few months. As I was looking for new pillows I came across this one. This pillow gives me neck and back support. I now sleep very deeply 8+ hours a night! I have been ignoring my alarm clock every morning. I am very pleased and I highly recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall idea of support, it provides great support for the back, good separation for the legs. However the neck area suffers from this pillow. It is just not made properly for this purpose. Also I would like to point that the quality of the filling of the pillow is low - it started to form cramps and uneven spots. That is disappointing and not comfortable at all. On the other hand I like to cover of the pillow, it is good cotton cover with dual sided colors - pink and blue. I suppose it is relatively good deal of the price and quality. But I would prefer it be better anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gushchina

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed not as plush as it seems. Smaller and not full or as wide.
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow for preparation of an upcoming surgery for Comfort and support in bed while healing. I have had “pregnancy” pillows and this is a huge disappointment. Is not proportional to what I see in the photos as far as the fullness. I got the 65” one and as you can see from the photos and video it really is smaller then advertised. The sides as you can see are not as large in width as the top. And even then it’s not a full supportive feeling pillow. I will be sending this one back. I hope you find this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Quality of Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I initially wasn’t a huge fan of how bulky this pillow is. It seemed like there was just an uncomfortable amount of padding to sleep properly. However, I’ve used this pillow for 6 weeks now, and it’s amazing. I don’t toss and turn all night anymore, and I wake up feeling fairly well rested (as well rested as I can with being 26 weeks pregnant). Totally worth the money. The bulkiness now feels quite comfortable and doesn’t bother me anymore. I’ve battled horrible heartburn with this pregnancy, so I’ve been sleeping with my regular pillow underneath the pregnancy pillow to elevate my head some. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this bamboo pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m now 21 weeks pregnant & I’ve been using the bamboo pillow for about a month now. I am more comfortable and sleep better. I wouldn’t say it prevents me from getting hot- I’m always hot these days in the Arizona temps but I’m never waking up sweaty. I like how I can easily move and manipulate the two sides. My husband even enjoys snuggling up against it when we sleep. We have a king size bed and the pillow takes up a little less than half the bed. So beware if you have a smaller bed. I do recommend this bamboo pillow. Very soft, hasn’t lost its shape & very comfortable to lay against.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loooovvveeeee this
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!!!!!!! Husband got me this pillow and i dont think i would have been sleeping this whole pregnancy without it!! It is SOOOOOO comfortable and takes all the pressure off
customer_reviews.author: Salvador solis

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and soft great for mamas struggling to get comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow performs exactly as advertised, it's both sturdy enough to not lose its shape while also soft enough to be comfortable as a pillow. It provides great cushion for the shoulders and both "ends" are able to provide leg support. I also appreciate that it's satin material is not the usual super slippery satin (which can cause the body temp to increase overnight). All in all a great product, I've had it for two months so far and it's made a real difference in my sleep quality (and pregnant women know we need ALL the help we can get when trying to get sleep at night!)
customer_reviews.author: MsGonzo

customer_reviews.title: Zero support, flimsy, sides much smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Based on some of the other reviews it sounds as though they used to make a higher quality product and now are just sending out junk. this offers zero support whatsoever. The “arms“ aren’t much thicker than my own arms. And they have zero support, they squish flat as soon as any weight is pushed onto them. Beyond disappointed, but it will be getting returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great Pregnancy Pillow for Improving Sciatica/Heart Burn
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pregnancy pillow overall, coming from a pregnant women who's suffering from pretty painful sciatica and heart burn and couldn't get much sleep. I did find that the top of the pillow where your head rests is really thick, thus it's hard for me to actually sleep with my head on this. However, I turn it upside down and still use my normal sleeping pillow, and it's perfect. I wish the inside pillow part was squishier/more movable so you could make certain areas thicker or thinner based on your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for side sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This really helps keep me positioned on my side at night. I’m a natural back sleeper and this far along in my pregnancy it’s best to lay on the side. With that being said, I have to constantly turn on both sides because my hips/upper thighs go numb. She. I keep the pillow together it helps elevate me off the mattress and offers me this sort of conclaves elevation. I do wish there was a way to tie the sides together to keep them from separating at night. But some people like to drape their leg on top of the side so I understand why. Color is nice. Fabric is nice. No smell when I unpackaged it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed and sleeping comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow for reading at bed before falling asleep. I place the large section behind my head and then place the two “arms” next to me or sometimes across my middle to hold the book in place. When I’m ready to sleep, I actually turn the pillow upside down so that my head is on my own pillow while the “arms” snuggle against my back and stomach, since I’m a side sleeper. Very comfortable pillow and quite large! We have a Queen sized bed and it takes up my entire half of the bed - with me sandwiched in the middle of the cushions - which is fine with me. Couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: IAWL

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little bit longer
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and was really debating which size to get (I got the original because the larger one just looked too bulky). I do like this pillow--I go back and forth between sleeping with it and ditching it for one million regular pillows. My body just needs to switch it up. I'm 37 weeks pregnant and have had it about a month. I don't regret the purchase, but I do wish it was longer so that my ankles and knees would be at the same level. I tried flipping it upside down, but that was no bueno. Anyway, I like it good enough but would probably try the larger size if I had to do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Beecher

customer_reviews.title: I’m not preggers but....
customer_reviews.text: I’m a man so I can’t use this pillow for it’s true intentions, but I do use this for shoulder pain relief. I’m a side sleeper and tuck my arm back and under my head when I sleep. Never had issues until a few years ago. I would wake up with severe shoulder pain from sleeping so awkwardly. Now with this pillow and a body ramp I wake up pain free. Even without the ramp I use this pillow and love it. This thing is so soft and cuddly it’s crazy. Easy on/off cover for easy cleaning which is a lifesaver! Definitely recommend for people who sleep on their side and have shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been a lifesaver for me after major surgery. I use it on top of a wedge pillow for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: LEELEE

customer_reviews.title: Get support and comfort fo
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the best thing since a new mattress. I have had shoulder, neck and back pain. With this pillow I have finally found some relief from tossing and turning from my discomforts. I highly recommend this pillow and style. It is supportive, portable, comfortable and not too bulky. I love how it can easily be converted with the zip off, side sleeve. I don't even need a pillow, and sometimes will take it to my couch to watch TV. I haven't had it long but hope it continues to be supportive and plush. AAA+
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second u-shaped pillow that I have owned. I bought this one to replace the one I've had for years. I am disappointed. Its sides are narrow and make it difficult to fully separate my legs the way I am accustomed too with my previous pillow. This pillow is also twice as expensive as the first one. The only thing I care about on this pillow purchase is the case. It is a lovely soft case in a pretty color. I would return but have no unearthly idea how I would do this, considering they sent the pillow in a vacuumed case, making it much smaller than it is now.
customer_reviews.author: VQB

customer_reviews.title: Beware, if you sleep with a partner, you will catch them stealing your pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Upside-Love how big it is (but not too big that it hogs the bed) and the curvature of the sides are perfect to provide that much needed back support(note I’m 5’4). Downside- this pregnancy my body temp has been a little higher and this pillow will overheat you especially in the grey sleep cover. I already know I will have to order a new cover by the spring(maybe sooner). I also wish it was a tiny bit firmer but maybe I’ll stuff it some more if I can find the matching filling. Overall a decent pillow. I catch either my husband, my daughter or my dog stealing my pillow ALL.THE.TIME. So beware. lol
customer_reviews.author: Betsy D

customer_reviews.title: A handmaid’s experience  from Gilead .
customer_reviews.text: Blessed be your fruit. After suffering back pain and a lot of discomfort during all my 7 pregnancies , I had enough! I had the courage to share with aunt Lydia my struggles and she was merciful enough to share what I was going through with my new commander. Praise be!!!!!! How graceful the Lord was , touching his heart to order this pillow for me!! It was a godsend!!! Now I sleep peacefully- pain free !!! Please ask your commander to order one for you or , if you don’t live in Gilead, order yourself. You won’t regret! Under his eyes. Ofjonah
customer_reviews.author: AnaC

customer_reviews.title: huge help
customer_reviews.text: so, my daughter didn't want her husband to spend so much on a pregnancy pillow but she has had back problems and sleeping issues. So, I said I would buy it for HIM for a gift, thereby taking away her complaint of the money for a short term solution (she was already 6 mos when they got it). She loves it, and funny thing so does he. It has helped him sleep better, too (when his shift changes and he is on nights). She swears it is a huge help, but he reminds her it is his and he is only letting her use it til the baby is born. Worth the money, people. NOT just for the pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not wearing well...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been great the past few months I’ve been using it. I love how long it is since I’m 5’8”. It goes to just below my knees and makes sleeping so much more comfortable. My only complaint is that it seems like the filling is clumping and moving a lot. I haven’t washed the filling portion of the pillow so the clumping seems odd. I would expect any pillow to slowly deflate and disperse the filling over time but this seems like it is either under filled or something else. Not sure it will last through more than one pregnancy due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate JUST get the pillow
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I get this sooner?!....I am 29 weeks and haven’t been able to get comfortable in bed for weeks. Got this in yesterday and got the best sleep I’ve gotten in a long while. Super comfy, full, it does have so weight to it which is comforting. Can’t wait to use it post pregnancy... got a u shaped pillow to help with my c section recovery. If you’re pregnant don’t hesitate to get this
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Legit AF- would have been so uncomfortable sleeping this whole pregnancy without this giant pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t top the gals review about going into witness protection with this thing but I certainly do agree with her!! I’ve slept with it every night since it arrived months ago and tho it's like having a blow up life boat in the bed it’s entirely worth the space and unfolding of myself to get out of bed. There’s no way I could have been getting as good of sleep during this pregnancy without this thing! It’s easy to clean and easy to unzip and customize stuffing location to make harder spots and saggier spots. It’s also going to be real handing for cuddles and breast feeding, the bend-ability is great and offers many different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, I prefer a different fabric cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow. I am 5’8 and the regular size is just fine for me. What I am not crazy about is the velvet cover. I find it scratchy and too hot. I wish I had ordered a jersey cover. My husband is sleeping with it now for that reason and he loves it. I also find the headrest to be too high for me. Several times during the night I got rid of this pillow and set up my regular pillows behind my head and between my knees. I think this is a good purchase but the firmness and fabric may not be great for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: LBH

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my dad after back surgery
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad after he had back surgery. He couldn't get comfortable at home the way he did at the hospital with all the pillows to hold him in one spot. You have to be careful when getting out of bed, but he says it's a game changer and makes him so much more comfortable. Couldn't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aaah, just what I needed--Buy some extra pillow stuffing, though
customer_reviews.text: Buy some extra pillow stuffing as many have recommended. This is definitely money well spent, but in about two months many of the key support points need some extra stuffing to perk it right up. Simply unzip, take some foam stuffing and put a few handfuls and rearrange it to suit your comfort needs. This pillow will continue to provide me with full body comfort for some time to come. Oh, and for the first time it'll fill out to full size in a day or two, but you can still use it right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Valmont

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: I definitely needed the extra support given lower back pain. Also, as someone who doesn't like to sleep on my side especially the left (which is best for baby), this helped train my body to sleep on the left side. The pillow won't alleviate back pain or pelvic pain but seemed to prevent it from getting worse while sleeping. Still had the normal pregnancy aches and pains - hips, etc. upon waking but without the pillow slept worse. It's also easier to maneuver this pillow than a bunch of individual pillows throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Great pregnancy pillow
customer_reviews.text: Used it all throughout my most recent pregnancy and it was very helpful. It is large, but perfect for fitting around the bump and having enough room for my legs. It would be crowded if you have a full size or smaller bed though. I liked that the cover came off and could be machine-washed. The filling material held up pretty well, but did start to flatten out after a couple of months of daily use. I had to go in and rearrange parts of the filling to make it more even. A good lounging pillow too once done with pregnancy. Overall very happy I decided to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnant women
customer_reviews.text: I am a belly-sleeper so I definitely needed something to prevent me from rolling onto my ever-growing stomach in the middle of the night. For me, this pillow was difficult to get used to; but now I don't notice any loss of sleep. My husband's only complaint is that me and this pillow take up 2/3 of our Queen sized bed, which is livable for 9 months but apparently not ideal. It would definitely work better in a bigger bed, but it works fine in a Queen! It does it's job and prevents me from rolling too far onto my stomach, so I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: Chinese knock off. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these body pillows. They are all wonderful accept this one. It is extremely cheap memory foam. And I own two Tempur pedics. It's a knock off Chinese brand that you have to pay to return even with Prime. Amazon will be hearing from me as well as they should reimburse the return.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing size and No support
customer_reviews.text: I received this and took it out of its vacuum sealed bag thinking that it would poof up to the size that it shows in the photos. Instead it is a floppy tiny unsupportive pillow. The model in the pictures must have a very small head and be very petite. The filling feels like bad poly stuffing from a craft store. It’s lumpy and missing filling in spots. When you’re pregnant you need support between your knees which is what I was expecting from this pillow instead it squishes flat and gives no support. I will be returning. Really surprised that the reviews are as high as they are.
customer_reviews.author: Grace15

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: As a side sleeper I always have issues with pillows and liked pillow against back, but that did not work unless I put bed against a wall. But not practicable for a king bed, a spouse and 2 cats! I am 71 years old, love it, love it! The only thing is because of size, not practical for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric, not satin or silk, not fluffy or full. Like a long motel pillow.
customer_reviews.text: You can see this isn’t silk or satin. It’s feels dry and cheap. For a pillow of this price and length 65”, it makes no sense why it feels like a cheap carnival prize. It doesn’t have a lot of density or fluff. It doesn’t feel like it’s filled with anything durable, like a motel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Allie L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pillow because I’m having problems sleeping in my second trimester. On the pictures it makes it seem like it is really full and long but when I received the pillow it is not long enough for me at all and really flat. It’s not comfortable at all and def not worth $51. I’m highly upset because I was really looking forward to finally getting some rest
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is what I’ve been needing all along. I purchased a new mattress thinking that was the need. Nooooo this is it! Slept beautifully last night. I’m not pregnant however when I sleep I would place a pillow between my legs behind me and under my stomach this purchaser took care of it all. Wow I’m in love very soft. There were many others that were less expensive however I chose this one due to the large number of positive reviews. So I can not speak as to say whether the others sleep as well as this one. They may or may NOT.
customer_reviews.author: TBarbour

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I would have managed this pregnancy without this darn pillow. It is the only thing that gets me comfortable in bed. I cannot sleep without it. Its absolutely wonderful and I have suggested this product to others and they are also in love with it. The material is super soft, not that jersey knit type of material so it doesn't make me hot. Its massive though so it does take up ALOT of space, but its so worth it :) I got he gray one to match with our bedding. I am not sure where I am going to put it when I don't need it anymore... I may still use it haha.
customer_reviews.author: Salt Family

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 5 stars because when I bought it, the wife shut up....... so it must of worked
customer_reviews.author: LmpJThompson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has helped tremendously. I'm really glad I bought it. I read about 20 reviews for all different pillows so many opinions so hard to choose but for the money and my needs this was perfect. I still have some trouble sleeping now that I'm 32 weeks but without the pillow I can't sleep at all. Would recommend to a friend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Conforti

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy & cheap! Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but couldn’t help myself with this one, especially since the majority of reviews are positive (which my mind is blown by!). This is the lumpiest, cheapest feeling pillow ever. My husband & I were laughing when we took it out of the box. It provides no support - night as well have no pillow at all between your legs. Immediately sending back. Don’t waste your money. I’ve tried a friend’s pillow before, so I KNOW there is MUCH better quality out there!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I would have given this item a 4/5. Even though I'm not pregnant, I suffer from fibromyalgia and this pillow is pretty comfortable. The reason for my 2/5 rating? The pillow ended up ripping around the top, two very large tears that I'm concerned. I hadn't even had it for 2 months yet (bought July 21st, ripped sometime last week). I am a little disappointed. I'm hoping others have better luck than I did. I'm purchasing another pillow in hopes I have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Yinger

customer_reviews.title: Sad pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure exactly what this is supposed to be LOL. I was so excited for this to come and for it to look like this is disappointing. The pillow doesn't even fill out the case entirely. The pillow is nowhere near as full as advertised. This is definitely not worth 50$$$$ .. return asap.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuasia Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth $50. I wouldn’t even pay $15. It’s lumpy, zero support, it needs twice the stuffing, and the material is rough. I’m so disappointed. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow, its large but dosent take up to much room in my King bed. I love that its long and able to cuddle up with it. I tried thefirst and love the queen rose much better. For comparison I am 5'3" Pros: Soft Nice and long Has a good ammount of filling and able to adjust level Grey one that i got was soft fabric cover Plenty of cover options Cons: Cover not good for summer or people that overheat
customer_reviews.author: Kristani

customer_reviews.title: Overall would recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my pregnancy pillow for a few weeks now and it still offers good support. I like that there’s a pillow cover that I can remove and wash. The pillow cover is also pretty soft. I bought the white and purple one and I use the white side facing up to match my bedding. It’s great for the price too at just $56.59 for my 60” pillow.
customer_reviews.author: jdw

customer_reviews.title: Image is a pathetic representation of Actual size.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently the product photo is unrelated? This thing is so much smaller (in girth) than what’s depicted in the product image. What a disappointment for Valentine’s Day too. The girth is about 1/2 the size of a lightly stuffed bed pillow, it just happens to go all around. My wife tried it for a short time and it was clear that a normal pillow does a better job. My wife is tall so I bought the biggest they had (65”) it’s plenty long but there is not much pillow in any spot. Not enough to support her head even.
customer_reviews.author: Xials

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where to begin with how bizarre this is. The whole thing came in a vacuum sealed bag, but only half of the pillow has fluffed up. The other half feels like it is filled with compressed hamster bedding. Definitely not as pictured or described. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MrsFin

customer_reviews.title: Decent pillow
customer_reviews.text: It took about a week to get used to sleeping with this pillow. I do like it though, much better than sleeping with a thousand individual pillows crammed around you. I wish it had more support for your top leg though. I find that my hip pain at night is quite intense and the pillow just isn’t thick enough for adequate support between your legs. When I add one of my own pillows it’s much better support for hip positioning. All in all, I wouldn’t give it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is so comfortable and really helped with my back pain that I started to experience during my 2nd trimester of pregnancy. It forms perfectly to my body and since purchasing this pillow I have been getting some really good sleep. This pillow is so nice that I have come in my room on numerous occasions and my 15-year old son was using it:) He asked me to order him one which I thought was cute as it is for pregnant women. Great pillow and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not pregnant, but i'm a side sleeper. I came across this product when i was searching for a pillow for side sleeper. I purchased this in Sept 2018 and used it everyday ever since. I'm thinking about purchasing another one as the current one filling in the pillow seem to be getting flat every day... Overall, is really great pillow giving a good back support as I sleep on side way. I don't have any back pain next morning. Is easy to peel off the cover and wash and put it back on as well.
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Very fluffy, works but head pillow to firm
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night to have support between my knees when side sleeping. The pillow is fluffy but doesn't compress like memory foam. The head pillow area is too firm and too high for my taste (hurts my neck) so I use it upside down and use a different pillow for my head. Still provides good knee support for side sleeping and behind the knee support when sleeping face up (if you have it in the upside down position.
customer_reviews.author: CkWorld

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this pillow so bad, but it’s been “fluffing” for 3 days now and the top part is still pretty flat it’s like I’m sleeping on my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bartula

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best thing I have bought during this pregnancy! This pillow is so helpful to sleep with despite my abnormally huge and uncomfortable belly! I am a stomach sleeper and this makes it possible for me to lay at and angle and "trick" myself that I am still sleeping tummy down! Plus I love the easy zip cover, makes washing and keeping clean a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, glad I bought it ... however
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow. So glad I bought it. But I had to remove the cover. It was really itchy. I’m washing it again to see if that will help but so far it’s just really itchy material. But since I took the cover off and just use the pillow part I’m extremely happy. It’s very comfortable, and being a month away from my due date not a lot is comfortable but this pillow is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Sa Ruh

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am a super hot sleeper. Most of the time I only have a sheet on me. This pillow does not keep me hot which was a huge concern of mine when I ordered it. The microfiber is soft and very comfortable. It didn't take long at all out of the packaging to fluff up. The only part I was sad about was a small hole near the zipper. Unfortunately it came this way but I can sew it up easily. My husband purchased the white one because he kept stealing mine!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly great pillow. I am not pregnant. I bought this pillow because I have a lot of low back and hip pain when I sleep. This pillow has completely alleviated those issues. It is so comfortable and cuddly also. I sleep very well now. When I sit up in bed to read I just slide it up and I get back support. It is so versatile and comfortable. The material is well made and very soft. I am happy with everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I bought this early on in my pregnancy to help me sleep. I wish I would have returned it. It's just so big. Originally the size was the appeal but once it arrived it was so overwhelming. I tried and tried to make it work but I just couldn't then it was too late to return. The material itself is comfortable but I can not get comfortable with the size so it's just sitting on the floor every night
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wife Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this pillow. She doesn't know how she survived the 1st pregnancy without it. FYI gentlemen....if you have a Queen bed you won't have much room left on your side of the bed! My wife's only complaint is the pillow cover material makes her hot at times, and there aren't alternative pillow cover options which are cooler.
customer_reviews.author: OkieD

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PILLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Y'all, this pillow is seriously amazing. It wraps around your whole body like a cocoon. I used to toss and turn at night, but now I stay pretty well put because I'm so comfortable, which is great because I actually sleep better now. The pillow is stuffed full, but not too full, so I no longer have pain in my neck in the morning. The zippers on the cover go all the way around the pillow making it easy to remove for washing and easy to put back on. Perhaps the only regret is my husband's - he misses cuddling with me, but y'all, I'm so happy. Don't delay. Buy the pillow. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Picture makes it look firmer than it is. Flimsy, lumpy and not worth more than $20
customer_reviews.text: I'm not pregnant but I bought this because I have a lot of back, neck and shoulder pain and need to stay on my sides without rolling onto my back. This is not as fluffy and big as the picture. It's flimsy and lumpy. I plan on buying more cotton to stuff it with but I gotta tell you, it's not worth the almost $50 it sells for. I would put this at $15 - $20. Wishing I would have just bought 2 body pillows from Walmart and sewn a pillowcase to keep them together..... It still would've been cheaper and more firm than this.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not as supportive as I hoped for and makes me burn up when I sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge pillow. It’s nice to have the link to be able to use it at all different positions. The cover is a velvety, velour type fabric which is very soft. Unfortunately, I get hot when I’m sleeping and this usually ends up waking me up because I get too hot to be comfortable anymore. So, it actually ends up disturbing my sleep rather than enhancing it. I was also expecting the stuffing to be more supportive. It doesn’t really give me the support I was looking for between my knees or when I rest my leg on it at night. I may be returning this, because it always ends up tossed on the floor by the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Farley

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and just buy a normal body pillow
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not worth the money. It’s cumbersome and huge. If you have a king sized bed or sleep alone in a queen, you’ll have space. But 2 people in a queen sized bed PLUS this pillow was impossible. I tried it for a few nights but it didn’t help at all, I couldn’t get comfy and it was more of a hassle than anything. Difficult to get out of when you need to get up and pee 30 times in the night. I returned this one and I ended up getting a cheap basic body pillow and that works WONDERS in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

product_meta.title: QUEEN ROSE Pregnancy Pillow(2 Sideds)-U Shaped Maternity Body Pillow with Cooling Cover
feature_bullets: Only Queen Rose Total Body Pillow Can Bend as a Double C Shaped Pillow for Leg Support

PREMIUM PREGNANCY PILLOW.Super soft pregnancy body pillow lets you get a good night of sleep throughout your pregnancy. The uniquely designed to follow the shape of the pregnancy mom, oversized U-shaped pillow support for back, hips, legs, belly,long enough for you to stretch out and support both sides of our body

TOTAL BODY SUPPORT.Our customers have used this pillow effectively for pregnancy support, nursing and for pain relief and comfort (whilst sleeping) for people with fibromyalgia, sciatica, gastric reflux, congestion, carpal tunnel syndrome, eliminate tossing and turning, ME etc. As well as helps support back, belly, sides, head, knees and feet
DESIGNED FOR SIDE SLEEPING.Comfort and support is now available with uniquely designed to follow the shape of the pregnancy mom, and big "U" shaped maternity support pillow for sleeping and feeding.
MULTI-POPURSE FOR YOU.The maternity body pillow creates comfortable positions when sleeping, reading, nursing, watching TV. Total Body Support for a painless and better sleep
CUSTOMER PLEASED. Our goal is for you to be completely satisfied,polyfill material is available adapts to your needs for comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,791 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Only Queen Rose Total Body Pillow Can Bend as a Double C Shaped Pillow for Leg Support
